Source: R/Study_Report.R
Study_Report.Rd

Study Report

Study_Report(
  lAssessments,
  dfStudy = NULL,
  dfSite = NULL,
  strOutpath = NULL,
  strReportType = "site"
)

Arguments

lAssessments

list The results of multiple assessments run using Study_Assess.

dfStudy

data.frame A data.frame containing study status metadata. Typically output from Make_Snapshot()$lSnapshot$status_study

dfSite

data.frame A data.frame containing site status metadata. Typically output from Make_Snapshot()$lSnapshot$status_site

strOutpath

character File path; location where the report will be saved.

strReportType

character The type of report to be generated. Valid values:

  • "site" for site-level KRI summary (default)

  • "country" for country-level KRI summary

Value

HTML report of study data.

Details

Create HTML summary report using the results of Study_Assess, including tables, charts, and error checking.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
# Using `Study_Assess()`
study <- Study_Assess()
Study_Report(study)
Study_Report(study, strReportType = "country")

# Adding metadata for a single snapshot
one_snapshot <- Make_Snapshot()
Study_Report(
  lAssessments = one_snapshot$lStudyAssessResults,
  dfStudy = one_snapshot$lSnapshot$status_study
)

# Longitudinal Data
snapshot <- Make_Snapshot()

longitudinal <- Augment_Snapshot(
  snapshot,
  system.file("snapshots", "AA-AA-000-0000", package = "gsm")
)

Study_Report(
  lAssessments = longitudinal$lStudyAssessResults,
  dfStudy = longitudinal$lSnapshot$status_study
)
}
